Package view.cli

Class Cli

java.lang.Object
observer.ViewObservable
view.cli.Cli
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class Cli extends ViewObservable implements View
Command line interface (CLI) for the game.

    • showTurn

      public void showTurn(String player, Board rcvGameBoard, Library rcvPlayerLibrary, ArrayList<ObjectCard> rcvObjectsInHand, int[] completedCommonObjectives, int[] availableCommonObjectivePoints, String firstPlayerToEnd, String playerNickname)
      This method shows the turn to the player.
      Specified by:
      showTurn in interface View
      Parameters:
      player - is the player's nickname, used in ClientController to check whether the message is for this user.
      rcvGameBoard - is the game board.
      rcvPlayerLibrary - is the player's library.
      rcvObjectsInHand - is the ArrayList of objects that a player currently has in hand.
      completedCommonObjectives - is the array containing the points the player has received from each common objective.
      availableCommonObjectivePoints - is the array containing the points still available for the common objectives.
      firstPlayerToEnd - is the nickname of the first player that has finished the game.
      playerNickname - is the nickname of this player. Needed for the GUI.

    • showNotMyTurn

      public void showNotMyTurn(Board rcvGameBoard)
      This method shows the board when it's not my turn, so that the current user does not see an outdated game board.
      Specified by:
      showNotMyTurn in interface View
      Parameters:
      rcvGameBoard - is the game board.

      This method show the lobby to the user.
      Specified by:
      showLobby in interface View
      Parameters:
      players - are the usernames of the players currently connected to the game.

    • showCommonObjectives

      public void showCommonObjectives(String player, CommonObjective commonObjective1, CommonObjective commonObjective2, int[] completedCommonObjectives, int[] availableCommonObjectivePoints)
      This method prints the current common objectives.
      Specified by:
      showCommonObjectives in interface View
      Parameters:
      player - is the player currently playing.
      commonObjective1 - is the first common objective of the game.
      commonObjective2 - is the second common objective of the game.
      completedCommonObjectives - is the array of points for each completed common objective.
      availableCommonObjectivePoints - is the array of available points for each common objective.

      Parameters:
